i think the fact that portal has a lot of anti-human sentiments, and that i thoroughly enjoy it, is really reaffirming in how misanthropic i am.

Epiphany aside, the game is also good.

I 100% recommend this!! It is possibly my favourite game ever, and you can get hours and hours out of it! At first it sounds like a simple story mode game which you can’t get much out of, but when you play you discover co-op mode, level builder, community tests, and all the amazing mods. I would recommend Portal Stories: Mel and Aperture Tag for mods, as they are 2 amazing things you can add to the game. It is a super cheap and amazing game, and I love it. I hope this review has convinced someone to buy it!
ITS A VERY VERY GOOD GAME BUY NOW

Классика, которую буду советовать своим детям. Здесь прелестно все: замечательный сюжет, с постепенным взрослением героев, сложные, но выполнимые разнообразные загадки, чудеснейшая озвучка и работа локализаторов. Эта игра — одна из немногих, когда вторая часть в разы превосходит первую и при этом превращается не в штампующуюся попсу, а классику.
10/10

Я слишком туп для этой игры

Another 𝘤𝘭𝘢𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘤 game you have to try at least once. Great puzzles that will make you feel like the smartest person on the world, while also maintaining a good storyline with just fantastic characters. I have to say that I think the voice acting is one of the best features of the game, they certainly help make every character be more memorable. Purely because of the voice acting, I can remember what every character's attitude was like despite that it has been 𝘺𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘴 since I first played! The campaign and story might be a tad short and some maps might look a bit repetitive, but I personally don't think those are a huge con. Everything else about the game gives shines brighter than a couple small faults.
Even after the campaign, you can try out coop or many of the workshop maps! You can continue the magic after the victory from the finale, and there are some 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺 creative maps out there. Invite your friend to play and it'll definitely feel like a smart bonding session you should enjoy.
Overall, I think this is a great game suited for every type of gamer and I definitely enjoyed it.

Ce jeu est un véritable chef d'oeuvre : la musique est géniale (Mike Morasky) mais ce scénario, je fus émerveillé par la fin qui était magnifique.
Pour finir le jeu (sans les succès steam et le mode multi) il faut environs une dizaine d'heure qui est je trouve un bon chiffre pour un jeu a 10 euros...
Si je devrais mettre une note je citerai un petit 18/20 : le seule point négatif c'est que me suis lassé assez vite 
mais je ne suis pas déçu.
En tous cas merci Valve pour ce jeu magnifique. ^-^
